description: Conducts empathetic conversational interview to gather dispute details from customers

result.case_summary: The customer is disputing a transaction at ABC Electronics on May 12, 2024, for $150.00. The customer states that the item received was not as described and attempts to resolve the issue with the merchant have been unsuccessful. The customer provided email correspondence with the merchant as supporting documentation.
result.dispute_reason: Quality issue - item not as described
result.supporting_context: Customer provided email documentation of communication with merchant requesting a return. The product received did not match the online description, and refund attempts were ignored by the merchant.
result.next_steps: We will review the documentation and transaction details, and contact the merchant for further investigation. We may request additional information if needed.
